La Porte County Sheriff's Office
April 3 at 5:18 PM ·

Today, Mr. Ben Anderson (South Central High School Principal) and Mr. Derek Budka (South Central Community School Corporation Assistant Director of Technology) delivered twenty face shields for employees of the LCSO.

Patrol Deputies and Jail Deputies each shift face hazardous conditions at a moments notice. This additional PPE will help tremendously as deputies work to provide professional dedicated service for the citizens of La Porte County.

The thoughtfulness of Mr. Anderson and Mr. Budka is greatly appreciated. Words cannot express enough thanks!
